#summary API for Stretchr iOS SDK

== Using the Stretchr iOS SDK ==

=== Setting your `key` and `secret` ===

In order to authenticate with Stretchr, you must set your key and secret.

{{{
[SRContext setKey:@"your-key" andSecret:@"your-secret"];
}}}

`your-key` - Your unique key provided by Stretchr

`your-secret` - Your secret string provided by Stretchr

=== Creating a new resource ===

{{{
SRResource *resource = [SRResource create];

[resource save];
}}}
